item.title: I built a new personal website with Hugo
item.description: Welcome Welcome to my website. In this first post I will go over some details on how this site was created. The site is static HTML, generated by Hugo Sourcecode is accesible on Github The generated HTML is hosted on Github pages Based on the hugo-coder theme So, I didn’t use a fancy CMS like Wordpress, or a platform like Medium for example. Why is that? I am a developer and actually like using text editors over GUI’s.
